website_summaries.verdict: Suitable for straight and curly hair, this spray not only detangles wet hair, but provides extra UV protection against heat during styling.
pros: Biotin helps smooth out everything from the toughest curls to the finest hair
cons: Not as highly rated as other products on the market in terms of heat protection

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. It is the only conditioning and styling product that makes my hair silky smooth, bouncy, and fresh looking without adding oil or weighing down my hair. I absolutely recommend this product to anyone. This is the only product I need for my hair after a shower to detangle. I also love how it looks after sleeping in it or blow drying! Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: YES, YES YES!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite go to product! I love the way it makes my hair feel and it smells fantastic! Great for leaving in your hair wet or blow dry afterward for soft smooth hair. A bit Pricey but well worth the money! The product came as specified and it was $1 cheaper than where I normally purchase it! I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: tracy winslow

customer_reviews.title: Growth in product!!! Tried to return first bottle for a second and STILL nasty growth!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first bottle 2 weeks ago. Received it with a layer of growth on the surface. Returned through Amazon and received my second bottle today. Even more growth than the first bottle. So unfortunate, I had received 2 bottles through a FabFitFun prescription and ordered once through Amazon a couple months ago and loved them! Not sure what happened with the formula, or if it was just a bad batch. Attempted to contact the company and have heard nothing in return. Don't waste your money. Buy a product that is more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hair Must!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Got in my Fab, Fit, and Fun box and have been hooked ever since. Leaves hair easy is to comb out, sets my hair beautiful when I dry it (minimizes frizz), and has a great scent. Bought 2 and gave one to my sister to try and she loves it too! Wish it wasn't quite so expensive but it is a fabulous product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! My favorite detangler ever. I have super fine hair that tangles really easily and this is the best. It also smells so good, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great scent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed a difference since using this product on damp hair before a blow out. Not only does it add in a heat protectant (I use another product after my hair is dry) but it also smells amazing! Highly recommend adding to your hair routine
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of tangles after washing!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very fine and tangles really bad when I wash it. This product is one of the first I've found to help my brush go through almost without any pulling. And it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a good review on YouTube. While it probably does protect your hair from heat damage, I’m not a fan of the smell. It does help to detangle but can be heavy if you use too much
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! Guys, this is seriously the best hair product ever! The smell isn’t the best (it’s not bad, just not especially good), but this does wonders to your hair! My hair is so soft, tames the wild hairs, and makes it look smooth (without being greasy)!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Something floating inside the bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this product is suppose to be like this that something is floating inside tried to shake it maybe it will dissolve but nothing happen I would never spray this in my hair like this look gross to me! Please I would love to hear any suggestion of this normal. Or safe to use!!im going send picture ..
customer_reviews.author: ttboys

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy creamy gunk on top
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read the reviews. I had been thinking about purchasing this because I’ve used it before and love the smell. I needed to buy another amazon item so I just clicked and purchased. I received my order and noted a creamy colored substance floating on top of the bottle. I have purchased this before in store & could not recall if that was present when I first got it. So I thought ok, sometimes products separate and you have to shake them. I didn’t recall ever having to shake my last bottle back together. Shook it, and still clumpy creamy topping the fluid in the bottle. Gross. I’ll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gower

customer_reviews.title: Smells SO good!
customer_reviews.text: I received a bottle of this in a FabFitFun box.. I fell in love and bought a bottle when it was gone. It smells so great and in addition to protecting my hair also gives me beautiful shine and softness.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Weird chunky white film gathered at the top of bottle
customer_reviews.text: Usually, I have no problems ordering this product but my latest order, I’ve had this chunky white film at the top of the bottle, it doesn’t disappear no matter how many times I shake it and i don’t dare to use it on my hair, I’ve tried to get a replacement but the replacement had the same weird film at the top. I hope the company can resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell and product lumpy
customer_reviews.text: Sadly disappointing :( some people me too as their product came lumpy and thought must be a fluke. Well mine did as well so not sure it is separated . The smell was awful. Smells like an old person lol. That’s personal preference though . Have to return for those reasons alone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: People are returning used product filled with water.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this product would have been. Didn’t try it. The other recent review stated there were thick goopy chunks in the bottle of liquid. I must have gotten the same bottle she did. My guess is someone used nearly the entire product, filled it to the top with water, and then returned it to Amazon for refund. Naughty.
customer_reviews.author: MeenaG

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It lightweight but rather order less. I would of liked something that made my hair smell fresh. Thought for the money I would of seen a difference in my blow out but rather unimpressed. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Collins

customer_reviews.title: one of my favourite products 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I process my hair a lot and this has been a god send in keeping it soft and not hay-like in texture. It smells incredible, lasts for months, and it shipped and arrived in like a day. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Going from waist length hair to shoulder length I was looking for a new product and this definitely fits the bill! I don’t like stiff hair and this definitely leaves it soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: kkp1969

customer_reviews.title: Bad formula
customer_reviews.text: It has white balls or something in it. It looks gross. I'm retuning it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It definitely protects your hair and leaves it silky without weighing it down. I have fine hair so this is important to me. I don’t care for the scent, but the product works so well I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this product. Before using this product I never brushed my hair after a shower because it becomes a frizzy mess and is super tangled. However, this product not only smells good, it works wonders! I will be repurchasing as soon as i run out. I love the how my hair feels after a shower now.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Floating bits
customer_reviews.text: Like other people experienced - I received the bottle with weird foam and floating bits inside. So disappointed. Will definitely not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: It changed! Won’t fully mix
customer_reviews.text: So I was running out of my current bottle of this detangler and needed it fast... hence amazon. Something changed with their formula because it is no longer homogenous aka it separates into layers. Even when shaken vigorously, the components will not fully mix.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Hearn

customer_reviews.title: What is floating in the bottle?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace product that I was pleased with, had good results with and had used up. I expected the same product when I ordered. What arrived was a product that appears to separated. I tried to shake it thinking that possibly it would blend. There are particles floating in the bottle. It smells good, sprays well, yet to be determined if it will have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Lane

customer_reviews.title: Sticky/smelly
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it! It leaves my hair sticky and I hate the smell. So expensive and I don’t ever use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and loved it. However, the one I received had something floating around in it. It smelled a little funky also. This bottle of Drybar Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler shouldn’t have passed QC
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Old or expired product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a few years. This was the first time I ordered it from amazon. It must be old. There are white chunks of something floating around in it. I tried shaking it to dissolve them, and it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product. Light weight but works very well I’m 50 and have fine hair. It softens and gets rid of fuzz but does not weigh it down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easier to brush out long hair!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this leave in conditioner. It helps to make brushing out wet hair easier. Smells good too!

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I loved this but I wasn’t in love.I don’t like the smell it gives my hair after. Overall it’s a good heat protectant.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cruz

customer_reviews.title: No more static.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. This is the first product that I have found that I can use in the winter time on my hair. Everything else would contribute to making my hair very staticky. With this I have no more static.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler that doesn't leave hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: Use all the time after the shower to detangle hair. Hair appears healthy and not oily (even if not blow dried). Pleasant smell that isn't super strong. Heat protectant properties as well.
customer_reviews.author: AgonKgon

customer_reviews.title: Big difference after using!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I have thick curly hair that has been very dry lately. It also tangles very easily. This product helps a lot to detangle, and when I straighten my hair, it adds so much shine and I see a huge difference. The smell is very minty which is strange for a moisturizing product but it’s nice nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I have always had extremely knotted hair and it only got worse after I dyed my hair. I had such bad tangles I could never brush my hair without major breakage. Finding this detangled has been life changing. So helpful. I am now able to brush my hair with no trouble. I love this detangler. Highly recommend,
customer_reviews.author: coffeeo

customer_reviews.title: lightweight detangler
customer_reviews.text: I spray this detangle on my hair as soon as I get out of the shower and comb through. I works great and I feel it helps keep my hair from tangling all day.
customer_reviews.author: M Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Soft and untangled hair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It smells so good. I have noticed it helps with heat since my ends were beginning to look red and now maintain their natural color. My hair is also soft and untangled.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and I absolutely love it. I feel like my hair is softer and healthier since using it and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: chris thompson

customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I was a bit skeptical about buying this product through Amazon. I was concerned I would be getting a fake product, however, I’ve compared this to my legit bottle and it seems right. Used this on my hair today and it seems normal as well. LOVE LOVE THIS DRYBAR PRODUCT! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same formula
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received this product through a fabfitfun box and wanted to reorder conveniently through amazon. When I received the product, it had thick yellow chunks floating around in if. When I opened the lid, the product had a horrible smell and a thick residue like film surrounding the bottom of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Smell good, nice that it protects but leave my hair in a weird texture for some reason

customer_reviews.title: Big chunks in bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and I LOVE it!!! So when I ran out and looked to find it as quickly as possible. However, this is what I received. It has some weird floating chunks in it. I tried shaking it and mixing it but it didn't work. I don't know if it's expired or something but I'm definitely not using this on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Marchbanks

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a detangler and heat protectant. Scent is not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: Price increased, shipping time increased, product not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. It came in my FabFitFun box and I loved it. I ordered it multiple times and it was my go-to product. Not sure what happened but now the price has almost doubled and it takes nearly 2 weeks to arrive. It is a good product but it is not that good.

customer_reviews.title: Pricy
customer_reviews.text: Pricy and doesn’t smell good but seems to work well.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t imagine not using it
customer_reviews.text: Originally tried from a Fab Fit Fun box. It’s lightweight and leaves my hair soft and silky after drying. I loved it so much that I had to order more.

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: Normally very good product but ordered from Amazon for the first time and came with a bunch of clumps in it. Disgusting. Sent it back and hoping the replacement doesn't have any clumps in it.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, leaves my hair soft and smelling beautiful. Not sure if it really protects from heat but I will repurchase for the scent and how beautiful my hair looks after I blow dry it, must be the vitamins in it.

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It detangles, smooths wet hair for easy brush through with no sticky feel afterwards. The scent is elegant, very light and not over bearing. This product is a must have for thick hair. I notice a big difference from using the Prep Rally vs. other similar products.

customer_reviews.title: love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!

customer_reviews.title: Best detangler out there!

product_meta.title: Drybar Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler 5 Ounces
feature_bullets: Shake Me Up! The conditioning ingredients in Prep Rally can sometimes rise to the top. Don’t worry! There is no affect in product performance. A quick shake will re-mix them back in.
Formulated with Biotin, Vitamins B & C and UV blockers, this lightweight detangler protects hair from heat (up to 450°F/232°C) and preps hair for optimal performance of styling products.

Biotin protects hair against dryness and increases strength/elasticity deep into the fiber of the hair, preventing breakage. Vitamins B & C nourish and support hair flexibility, strength and texture to improve overall hair health. Sea Berry Oil maintains moisture in the hair shaft, leaving hair feeling soft and conditioned but never weighed down.
Stylist Tip: Use Prep Rally on wet hair prior to ANY other Drybar styling product to enhance its benefits
No parabens, sulfates, or phthalates. Cruelty-free, no animal testing. Noir scent with notes of ginger, mint, and sandalwood. Great for all hair types.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
